files.patch:
@@ -141,1 +141,1 @@
-        // Lowercase by setting a single bit
+        // ASCII and Latin-1 were designed to optimize case-twiddling operations
@@ -154,1 +154,1 @@
-        // Uppercase by removing a single bit
+        // ASCII and Latin-1 were designed to optimize case-twiddling operations
@@ -183,1 +183,1 @@
-         // Uppercase b1 by removing a single bit
+         // ASCII and Latin-1 were designed to optimize case-twiddling operations
